rev.comment: removed some of introduction...most of this imformation is contained in the critism section, and it is poorly written/has sentence fragments...
rev.diff:
Line 18: Line 18:
Google was co-founded by [[Larry Page]] and [[Sergey Brin]] while they were students at [[Stanford University]] and the company was first incorporated as a [[privately held company]] on [[September 7]], [[1998]]. Google's [[initial public offering]] took place on [[August 19]], [[2004]], raising [[United States Dollar|$]]1.67 billion, making it worth $23 billion. Through a series of new product developments, acquisitions and partnerships, the company has expanded its initial search and advertising business into other areas, including web-based [[email]], online mapping, office productivity, and video sharing, among others.
Google was co-founded by [[Larry Page]] and [[Sergey Brin]] while they were students at [[Stanford University]] and the company was first incorporated as a [[privately held company]] on [[September 7]], [[1998]]. Google's [[initial public offering]] took place on [[August 19]], [[2004]], raising [[United States Dollar|$]]1.67 billion, making it worth $23 billion. Through a series of new product developments, acquisitions and partnerships, the company has expanded its initial search and advertising business into other areas, including web-based [[email]], online mapping, office productivity, and video sharing, among others.
â   â
Like most large corporations, Google's businesses have drawn some [[Criticism of Google|controversy]], such as [[copyright]] disputes in its [[Google Book Search|book search project]], or [[censorship by Google]] of search results as it works with countries such as [[China]] (and to a lesser extent [[France]], [[Germany]]), which have laws requiring the company hide information from Google users in their country. Additionally, in the [[September 11, 2001 attacks|post September 11 era]], several governments and militaries have raised concerns about the national security risks posed by vivid geographic details provided by [[Google Earth]]'s satellite imaging.
